data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Requesting Net::Dev for a space to put Perl Modules that
    communicate with Network Devices. Communication may be achieved
    through other modules, such as Net::SNMP, Net::Telnet, LWP,
    Net::FTP, etc etc. This communication with the network device would
    be use to manage the device. A Net::Dev module would use a
    'protocol' type module to access the device and then perform desired
    functions on the device.

    Other modules to support the communicating modules are also
    envisioned, such as Net::Dev::Tools. A planned upload is
    Net::Dev::Tools::MIB::MIBLoadOrder, (determines load order for a NMS
    given a group of MIBs).

    My work includes writing scripts that solve customer problems on
    network devices, have written several modules to support myself,
    would like to post publicly.
